titles.title: "`Kokoro` o `Yaiba` de Kakushite `Shinobi` to Yomu. `Honki` to Kaite `Maji` to Yomu no to wa Chotto Chigau de Gozaru" by Kaede
Il est question de Camping. Pourquoi ?
You Hide the `Heart` with a `Sword` and Read It as Ninja. It Is a Little Different Than How You Write `Serious` and Read It as `For Real`.
「"心"を"刃"で隠して"忍"と読む. "本気"と書いて"マジ"と読むのとはチョット違うでござる」by楓
